cards.효과: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.
cards.comment: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

cards.효과: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
cards.comment: His mother said that he was just big boned.

cards.효과: Deal 10 damage.
cards.comment: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand.
cards.comment: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

cards.효과: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
cards.comment: See?  Giant.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
cards.comment: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

cards.효과: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
cards.comment: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

cards.효과: Charge
cards.comment: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
cards.comment: 'TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!'

cards.효과: Spell Damage +5
cards.comment: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

cards.효과: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns.
cards.comment: Time to write some flavor text.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
cards.comment: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

cards.효과: At the end of your turn, add a Dream Card to your hand.
cards.comment: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

cards.효과: Restore #8 Health. Draw 3 cards.
cards.comment: A grammatically awkward life saver.

cards.효과: Destroy all minions.
cards.comment: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

cards.효과: Windfury, Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt
cards.comment: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

cards.효과: ChargeEnrage: +6 Attack
cards.comment: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

cards.효과: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
cards.comment: He's Gruul 'the Dragonkiller'.  He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

cards.효과: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
cards.comment: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord.  Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

cards.효과: Divine Shield. Taunt. Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
cards.comment: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

cards.효과: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
cards.comment: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

cards.효과: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
cards.comment: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

cards.효과: Choose One - Draw a card; or Restore 5 Health.
cards.comment: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

cards.효과: Choose One -+5 Attack; or +5 Health and Taunt.
cards.comment: Young Night Elves love to play 'Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?'  You lose if you get crushed to death.

cards.효과: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to your hand.
cards.comment: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

cards.효과: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
cards.comment: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

cards.효과: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
cards.comment: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

cards.효과: Stealth
cards.comment: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He'll take care of the rest.

cards.효과: Deal 8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
cards.comment: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

cards.효과: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
cards.comment: This spell can be very Entertaining.

cards.효과: Deal 5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
cards.comment: Often followed by Holy Smokes!

cards.효과: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to your hero.
cards.comment: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

cards.효과: ChargeDivine Shield
cards.comment: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
cards.comment: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

cards.효과: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/5 Baine Bloodhoof.
cards.comment: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It's pretty insensitive.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Freeze a character.
cards.comment: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

cards.효과: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
cards.comment: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

cards.효과: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
cards.comment: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

cards.효과: Whenever you play a card, summon a 2/1 Flame of Azzinoth.
cards.comment: Illidan's brother, Malfurion, imprisoned him beneath Hyjal for 10,000 years.  Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.

cards.효과: Combo: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
cards.comment: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
cards.comment: If she threatens to 'moon' you, it's not what you think.

cards.효과: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
cards.comment: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

cards.효과: TauntDivine Shield
cards.comment: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Don’t worry!

cards.효과: Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
cards.comment: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
cards.comment: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

cards.효과: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.
cards.comment: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
cards.comment: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

cards.효과: Windfury
cards.comment: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

cards.효과: Windfury, Overload: (2)
cards.comment: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

cards.효과: Deal 2 damage to a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
cards.comment: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

cards.효과: Double a minion's Attack.
cards.comment: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

cards.효과: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
cards.comment: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

cards.효과: Deal 5 damage to a minion and 2 damage to adjacent ones.
cards.comment: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

cards.효과: Summon three 2/2 Treants.
cards.comment: 'I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!' - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

cards.효과: Draw a card and deal damage equal to its cost.
cards.comment: C'mon Molten Giant!!

cards.효과: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
cards.comment: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

cards.효과: Choose One - Deal 5 damage to a minion; or 2 damage to all enemy minions.
cards.comment: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.

cards.효과: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to ALL characters.
cards.comment: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

cards.효과: Spell Damage +1. Battlecry: Draw a card.
cards.comment: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 7 or more.
cards.comment: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him.  Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1/+1.
cards.comment: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

cards.효과: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
cards.comment: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

cards.효과: Choose One - Charge; or +2 Health and Taunt.
cards.comment: Cat or Bear?  Cat or Bear?!  I just cannot CHOOSE!

cards.효과: Taunt. Overload: (3)
cards.comment: Nothing beats rock.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
cards.comment: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

cards.효과: Taunt
cards.comment: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn't an actual beast.   Boom, New Name!

cards.효과: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.
cards.comment: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

cards.효과: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
cards.comment: At least he has Angry Chicken.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Squire.
cards.comment: It's good to be a knight.   Less so to be one's squire.

cards.효과: Enrage: Your weapon has +2 Attack.
cards.comment: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
cards.comment: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

cards.효과: Stealth
cards.comment: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

cards.효과: Your minions cost (3) more.
cards.comment: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.

cards.효과: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn and 4 Armor.
cards.comment: Chew your food!

cards.효과: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemy minions.
cards.comment: 'Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that.' - Shan, Rogue Trainer

cards.효과: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal 1 damage to them.
cards.comment: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

cards.효과: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
cards.comment: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

cards.효과: Put a copy of a random minion from your opponent's deck into the battlefield.
cards.comment: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

cards.효과: Deal 4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal 6 instead.
cards.comment: 'If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike.' - The Warrior Code, Line 6

cards.효과: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
cards.comment: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

cards.효과: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
cards.comment: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

cards.효과: Give your minions 'Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant.'
cards.comment: 'Reforestation' is suddenly a terrifying word.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
cards.comment: Most pandaren say his brew tastes like yak.  But apparently that's a compliment.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Spell Damage +1.
cards.comment: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else's game.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Equip a 2/2 weapon.
cards.comment: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

cards.효과: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.
cards.comment: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

cards.효과: Whenever one of your other minions dies, draw a card.
cards.comment: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
cards.comment: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore.  Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

cards.효과: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
cards.comment: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending.  But it does.

cards.효과: Taunt. Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
cards.comment: 'Yarrrr' is a pirate word that means 'Greetings, milord.'

cards.효과: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
cards.comment: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

cards.효과: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Silence a minion.
cards.comment: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

cards.효과: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
cards.comment: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

cards.효과: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.
cards.comment: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him 'Master of Disguise' for nothing.

cards.효과: Taunt
cards.comment: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King.   BOOOORRRINNG!

cards.효과: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
cards.comment: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

cards.효과: Divine Shield
cards.comment: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didn’t go so well…

cards.효과: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
cards.comment: Spellbreakers can rip enchantments from magic-wielders.  The process is painless and can be performed on an outpatient basis.

cards.효과: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
cards.comment: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don't get any ideas!

cards.효과: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
cards.comment: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy.  And Tacos.
